addBackground(InstructionsPanel) - Method in class panels.InstructionsPanel
This method combines the back button created in the InstructionsPanel method with the image created in the InstructionsBg Class.
addBindings(GraphicalPanel) - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method maps the up, down, left, right and space keys to their corresponding actions in the action package.

This method adds a bomb to the game.
